data.title: KMS TEAM – MENTZ
data.meta_description: KMS TEAM got to the heart of MENTZ’s market position – developing an inspired brand with an unmistakable look.
data.meta_site_name: Experience ingenuity – KMS TEAM and MENTZ
data.text:
Competitive analysis

for brand development

Mentz hired us to develop an effective brand identity that sets the company’s positioning apart from competitors more effectively. After conducting extensive research on the competition, we analyzed all brand touch points from press release to trade show exhibition. Interviews with customers and employees provided insights into the strengths and potentials of the company and the industry overall. Megatrends also provided additional reinforcement for the future positioning.

Brand identity and guiding principle

We used the results of our extensive research to streamline the strategic positioning and derive an inspiring, yet applicable identity for all business units - effectively summed up in our guiding principle: »Digital Pathfinders«.

Mobility app »Gullivr«

»Gullivr« is a central service application by MENTZ – a solution that unifies a wide range of different mobility services in one app. In addition to classic features like route planning, incident reporting as well as ticket and profile management, we came up with other helpful services like weather-based route planning and personalised mobility profiles based on kilometres travelled and CO₂ emissions prevented.

The white label app uses the existing MENTZ design system as a default but can be adapted to the corporate design of each transportation company.
